name: git-stats
description: Generates comprehensive git repository statistics including commits, authors, activity patterns by day/hour, top files, and timeline analysis.

repoPath.description: Path to git repository to analyze

maxAuthors.description: Maximum number of top authors to include

output.format: { commits, authors: [{name, commits, additions, deletions}], byDay, byHour, topFiles, firstCommit, lastCommit }

tokenSavings: Saves 600-1500 tokens by providing structured git analysis instead of manual log parsing
